title: Rehydration Drink Mix — Electrolyte + Amla
excerpt: Natural rehydration powder combining dried coconut water, amla, rock salt, and jaggery to restore electrolytes and minerals gently.
content:
## What Is This Rehydration Mix?
A natural electrolyte powder using dried coconut water powder, amla for vitamin C and antioxidants, rock salt for minerals, and coconut sugar or jaggery for gentle glucose to aid absorption.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Rehydration supports digestive fire and mineral balance after exertion or heat exposure. Amla adds a cooling, restorative Rasayana touch to conventional electrolyte formulas.

### Key Benefits
- Replaces fluid and electrolytes after exertion or heat exposure.
- Supports gentle digestion and recovery with amla antioxidants.
- Single-serve convenience for travel and activity.

## Ingredients
- Dried coconut water powder
- Amla powder
- Rock salt (electrolyte mineral)
- Coconut sugar or jaggery (for taste and gentle carbs)

## Usage Instructions
- Mix one single-serve sachet with 500–750 ml water and sip after exercise or in heat.

## Packaging
- Single-serve compostable sachets for convenience.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult your doctor if you have kidney disease, hypertension, or are on electrolyte-affecting medications.

## Why Choose This Mix?
A simple, plant-forward rehydration solution that brings traditional ingredients into practical modern use.
